com.guidewire.ab.external.entity

Interface WorkflowSearchCriteria

  • All Superinterfaces:
    gw.pl.external.entity.Entity, gw.pl.external.entity.KeyableEntity, Versionable
    Deprecated. 
    External entities are deprecated. Please use the new Java API instead.

    @Deprecated
public interface WorkflowSearchCriteria
extends Versionable, gw.pl.external.entity.Entity
    Search criteria used for workflow searches.
